Adventure floors?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Adventure floors?
By Infernus on Thursday, April 12, 2007 - 04:32 pm:

So yeah, does anyone know how many floors each adventure has (including plus adventures)? The only one I actually know is Kawrea at 10.

I've started playing again, and want to visit a few areas to fill out my items, but need to know floor amounts for energy management (and don't want to waste my time going through all of them to figure it out).

I keep thinking some of the adventure+ ones have 12.

Surprisingly, I couldn't find it anywhere else.

By Infernus on Sunday, April 15, 2007 - 08:19 pm:

Not that you can reply, but Promiass is definitely 8, and you were wrong about Togle+, which is 10.

Proof of why memory is not a reliable source of information. It's mildly annoying when misinformation ruins an adventure for me, and wastes an hour and a half of my time.

I'll likely end up going through Togle and Kalaragi again soon (always seemed to have better luck grabbing documents there). Fortunately, energy management is not necessary in those adventures.

By Raistlin_Majere on Sunday, April 15, 2007 - 08:37 pm:

better redocument it infernus so that other players can just use it as reference

By VidgamerX on Friday, August 10, 2007 - 05:47 pm:

Here's how deep all the adventures go. I just tested them all out.
Togle Caves = 5
Togle Caves+ = 10
Kalaragi Jungle = 7
Kalaragi Jungle+ 12
Promiass Ruins = 8
Promiass Ruins+ = 12
Kawrea Volcano = 10
Kawrea Volcano+ = 12
